review: The only thing I wished it could do like Chrome cast does is mirror you Internet from the iPad. Other than that, it's awesome!
author: Todd

review: As always with Prime it arrived very quickly. It is beautifully designed and packaged, and was very easy to install. Excellent product!
author: Carl "Home office"

review: I don't think Amazon accurately lets everyone know how amazing the fire stick is!  It easy installation, no more than five minutes!  I am now able to get my prime content on the tv screen...even if you don't have prime it is still a wonderful device..the price is right and the Amazon app gives it voice control.
author: Judi

review: Like it.  The sound is good, it looks good.
author: cmotta5154
